subject: Re: Thank you, we are accepting your refinance loan request
body:
Your your credit report does not matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
 
$484,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this easy form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://planzxtranes.com/
